title: A Raisin in the Sun repetition of you

content.question: In line 19 (“I know . . . Independence”) and line 21 (“Yes . . . what”) , Beneatha’s repetition of “you” contributes to her tone of

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
